elements.name: question2
elements.html:
In this task, you will integrate the code snippets youâ€™ve collected to build a space-invader game, which looks like the below:

Use left/right key to control the player movement (at the bottom-center) of the stage. Press space key to shoot bullets from the player. When you have destroyed all enemies, a "you win" banner will show up.

You need to click inside the stage to change focus to stage. Otherwise, it might not react to your keyboard actions.
